attributes.action: publish the numbers of people diagnosed with TB in the United Kingdom and how the numbers have increased or decreased
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is believed that TB is gaining momentum in the United Kingdom. The public must be informed of the true numbers of TB and whether it is increasing or decreasing. The current Government must publish all the statistics on TB, cause, numbers,population where TB is most prevalent and how the medical profession is ensuring TB does not spread amongst adults and children etc.
